wikipedia_page.main: Brian Ross, also known as Brian Smith (born 1954) is an English vocalist, who is best known as the frontman of heavy metal bands Satan, from 1983 to 1984, in 2004, and since 2011, and Blitzkrieg, from 1980 to 1981, from 1984 to 1991, from 1992 to 1994, from 1996 to 1999, and since 2001. He also performs as Alice Cooper in Alice Cooper's Nightmare, a tribute show in United Kingdom.Ross's son, Alan Ross, has been the guitarist of Blitzkrieg since 2012, as well as providing backing vocals on the album Back From Hell.

response: *Brian Ross (singer) (born 1954), British vocalist for heavy metal bands Blitzkrieg and Satan
